**Project Title**
Nimble Assurance of an IT-Enabled Project
==========================

**Contract Reference**
PW-22-01011297

**Tender Closing Date**
2022-11-15T14:00:00

**Contracting Entity**
Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada (PSEPC)

### Project Overview

The Government of Canada, through Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada (PSEPC), is seeking proposals from pre-qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to provide nimble IT audit services under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement.

### Project Requirements

- **Requirements Summary** : 
The requirement is open to pre-qualified SA Holders who meet the requirements under Stream 3: Information Technology and Systems Audit.
- **Duration** : The period of the contract will be from the date of award until May 30, 2023, with an option to extend for four years.
- **Evaluation Process** :
The evaluation process will be based on a combined score of 70% for technical merit and 30% for price.

### Project Deliverables
The consultant(s) will provide independent, real-time assurance services to support the Internal Audit and Evaluation Directorate (IAED) of Public Safety Canada. Specific management elements will be subject to change, but may include strategy, value, risk, business process, transformational IT, and program and project management.

### Intellectual Property Rights
All intellectual property rights will vest with the Public Safety Canada.

### Security Clearance
A secret security clearance is required for this project.

### Contact Information
Contact details for this project are as follows:
- **Email** : contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca
